department: Public Works and Government Services Canada
description: The Canadian Forces Joint Signal Regiment (CFJSR), Canadian Forces Base (CFB) Kingston (CFJSR) has a requirement for contractor support in the form of up to one Level 1 Information/records management/recordkeeping specialist to support IM requirements at CFJSR.
full_summary:
# Tender Announcement
Information Management Specialist
## Project Details

* **Solicitation Number**: W3028-23TM02/C
* **Tender Closing Date**: 2022-09-28T14:00:00
* **Region**: Ontario (except NCR)

## Proposal Information

We are soliciting proposals for a comprehensive information management service, specifically for a Level 1 Information/records management/recordkeeping specialist, to support the Canadian Forces Joint Signal Regiment (CFJSR) at Canadian Forces Base (CFB) Kingston.

### Description of the Requirement

The CFJSR requires a contractor to provide a specialist to support information management requirements, specifically to perform tasks related to document and record control. This project requires a lowest/lower price, as outlined in the procurement methodology.

### Status of the Requirement

This procurement is open to eligible suppliers who have a permanent listing or have qualified under the corresponding category. Interested suppliers should submit their proposals according to the instructions outlined in the request for proposal.

### Vendor Information

A complete list of eligible suppliers is available on the Buy and Sell tenders website at https://buyandsell.gc.ca/procurement-data/tender-notice/PW-ZT-002-33463. Suppliers must submit their proposals in either English or French.

### Contact Information

Should you require further information, please do not hesitate to contact:

* **Name**: Ramnarine, Vashti
* **Email**: vashti.ramnarine@pwgsc-tpsgc.gc.ca
* **Phone**: (289) 772-7284

### Notes

* This procurement is subject to the Controlled Goods Program.
* A complete list of eligible suppliers is available on the website.
* Proposal submissions should be made in either English or French.
